member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.DefaultValueHandling
member.summary: Specifies default value handling options.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DefaultValueHandling.Include
member.summary: Include members where the member value is the same as the member's default value when serializing objects. Included members are written to JSON. Has no effect when deserializing.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DefaultValueHandling.Ignore
member.summary: Ignore members where the member value is the same as the member's default value when serializing objects so that it is not written to JSON. This option will ignore all default values (e.g. null for objects and nullable types; 0 for integers, decimals and floating point numbers; and false for booleans).

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DefaultValueHandling.Populate
member.summary: Members with a default value but no JSON will be set to their default value when deserializing.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DefaultValueHandling.IgnoreAndPopulate
member.summary: Ignore members where the member value is the same as the member's default value when serializing objects and set members to their default value when deserializing.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonPropertyAttribute
member.summary: Instructs the JsonConvert to always serialize the member with the specified name.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonPropertyAttribute.NullValueHandling
member.summary: Gets or sets the null value handling used when serializing this property.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonPropertyAttribute.DefaultValueHandling
member.summary: Gets or sets the default value handling used when serializing this property.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonPropertyAttribute.ObjectCreationHandling
member.summary: Gets or sets the object creation handling used when deserializing this property.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonPropertyAttribute.TypeNameHandling
member.summary: Gets or sets the type name handling used when serializing this property.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonPropertyAttribute.Required
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this property is required.
member.value: A value indicating whether this property is required.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonPropertyAttribute.Order
member.summary: Gets or sets the order of serialization of a member.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonPropertyAttribute.PropertyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the property.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonPropertyAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonPropertyAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name.
member.param: Name of the property.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonIgnoreAttribute
member.summary: Instructs the JsonSerializer not to serialize the public field or public read/write property value.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonException
member.summary: The exception thrown when an error occurs during JSON serialization or deserialization.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or null if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializationException
member.summary: The exception thrown when an error occurs during JSON serialization or deserialization.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializationException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializationException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or null if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings
member.summary: Specifies the settings on a object.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings.NullValueHandling
member.summary: Gets or sets how null values are handled during serialization and deserialization.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings.DefaultValueHandling
member.summary: Gets or sets the default value handling used when serializing a property.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings.TypeNameHandling
member.summary: Gets or sets how type name writing and reading is handled by the serializer.
member.remarks: should be used with caution when your application deserializes JSON from an external source. Incoming types should be validated with a custom SerializationBinder /> when deserializing with a value other than .

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings.ContractResolver
member.summary: Gets or sets the contract resolver used by the serializer when serializing .NET objects to JSON and vice versa.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert
member.summary: Provides methods for converting between .NET types and JSON types.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to a JSON string.
member.param: The object to serialize.
member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(System.Object,Newtonsoft.Json.Formatting)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to a JSON string using formatting.
member.param: The object to serialize.
Indicates how the output should be formatted.
member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(System.Object,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to a JSON string using formatting and .
member.param: The object to serialize.
The used to serialize the object. If this is null, default serialization settings will be used.
member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(System.Object,System.Type,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to a JSON string using formatting and .
member.param: The object to serialize.
The type of the value being serialized. This parameter is used when TypeNameHandling is Auto to write out the type name if the type of the value does not match. Specifying the type is optional.
The used to serialize the object. If this is null, default serialization settings will be used.
member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(System.Object,Newtonsoft.Json.Formatting,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to a JSON string using formatting and .
member.param: The object to serialize.
Indicates how the output should be formatted.
The used to serialize the object. If this is null, default serialization settings will be used.
member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

member.summary: Serializes the specified object to a JSON string using formatting and .
member.param: The object to serialize.
The type of the value being serialized. This parameter is used when TypeNameHandling is Auto to write out the type name if the type of the value does not match. Specifying the type is optional.
Indicates how the output should be formatted.
The used to serialize the object. If this is null, default serialization settings will be used.
member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

member.summary: Deserializes the JSON to the specified .NET type.

The of object being deserialized.
member.returns: The deserialized object from the JSON string.

member.summary: Deserializes the JSON to the specified .NET type.
member.typeparam: The type of the object to deserialize to.
member.param: The JSON to deserialize.
member.returns: The deserialized object from the JSON string.

member.summary: Deserializes the JSON to the given anonymous type.
member.typeparam: The anonymous type to deserialize to. This can't be specified traditionally and must be inferred from the anonymous type passed as a parameter.
member.param: The JSON to deserialize.
The anonymous type object.
member.returns: The deserialized anonymous type from the JSON string.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.DeserializeAnonymousType``1(System.String,``0,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Deserializes the JSON to the given anonymous type using .
member.typeparam: The anonymous type to deserialize to. This can't be specified traditionally and must be inferred from the anonymous type passed as a parameter.
member.param: The JSON to deserialize.
The anonymous type object.
The used to deserialize the object. If this is null, default serialization settings will be used.
member.returns: The deserialized anonymous type from the JSON string.

member.summary: Deserializes the JSON to the specified .NET type using .

member.param: The object to deserialize.
The used to deserialize the object. If this is null, default serialization settings will be used.
member.returns: The deserialized object from the JSON string.

member.summary: Deserializes the JSON to the specified .NET type using .

The type of the object to deserialize to.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.PopulateObject(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Populates the object with values from the JSON string.

The target object to populate values onto.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.PopulateObject(System.String,System.Object,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Populates the object with values from the JSON string using JsonSerializerSettings.
member.param: The JSON to populate values from.
The target object to populate values onto.
The JsonSerializerSettings used to deserialize the object. If this is null, default serialization settings will be used.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.NullValueHandling
member.summary: Specifies null value handling options for the .

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.NullValueHandling.Include
member.summary: Include null values when serializing and deserializing objects.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.NullValueHandling.Ignore
member.summary: Ignore null values when serializing and deserializing objects.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConstructorAttribute
member.summary: Instructs the JsonSerializer to use the specified constructor when deserializing that object.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.ObjectCreationHandling
member.summary: Specifies how object creation is handled.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.ObjectCreationHandling.Auto
member.summary: Reuse existing objects, create new objects when needed.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.ObjectCreationHandling.Reuse
member.summary: Only reuse existing objects.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.ObjectCreationHandling.Replace
member.summary: Always create new objects.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.Required
member.summary: Indicating whether a property is required.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.Required.Default
member.summary: The property is not required. The default state.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.Required.AllowNull
member.summary: The property must be defined in JSON but can be a null value.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.Required.Always
member.summary: The property must be defined in JSON and cannot be a null value.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.Required.DisallowNull
member.summary: The property is not required but it cannot be a null value.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.Serialization.CamelCasePropertyNamesContractResolver
member.summary: Resolves member mappings for a type, camel casing property names.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.Serialization.IContractResolver
member.summary: Used by to resolve a contract for a given .

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.Formatting
member.summary: Specifies type name handling options for the .

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.Formatting.None
member.summary: No special formatting is applied. This is the default.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.Formatting.Indented
member.summary: Causes child objects to be indented according to the Indentation and IndentChar settings.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.TypeNameHandling
member.summary: Specifies type name handling options for the .

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.TypeNameHandling.None
member.summary: Do not include the .NET type name when serializing types.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.TypeNameHandling.Objects
member.summary: Include the .NET type name when serializing into a JSON object structure.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.TypeNameHandling.Arrays
member.summary: Include the .NET type name when serializing into a JSON array structure.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.TypeNameHandling.All
member.summary: Always include the .NET type name when serializing.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.TypeNameHandling.Auto
member.summary: Include the .NET type name when the type of the object being serialized is not the same as its declared type.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.Utils.AssemblyVersionMarker
member.summary: The class is to get version string representation either of the current assembly or Compiler

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Utils.AssemblyVersionMarker.GetVersion(Newtonsoft.Json.Utils.AssemblyVersionMarker.VersionType)
member.summary: Compiler will replace the method call with an version required by method parameter
member.param: Specifies either CurrentAssembly or Compiler version, default is CurrentAssembly
member.returns: Current assembly or Compiler version in string representation
